description.oldValue:
Stream videos that are saved in OneDrive and
SharePoint are now embedded in chat and channels enabling users to preview and
play them directly in Teams without the need to open a browser window.
description.newValue: Stream videos that are saved in OneDrive and SharePoint are now embedded in chat and channels enabling users to preview and play them directly in Teams without the need to open a browser window. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
